alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 24 at 3:26AM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Southwest Mountains, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Central Highlands, South Central Highlands, and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects such as holiday decorations. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands; Southwest Mountains
